body:
the kind engineer, who was truly and exceptionally kind today and helped me have a difficult conversation that i needed to have

group chat talking about which sitcom characters our friends would be

perilla leaves, which are so key for ssam

elton john’s falsetto on “goodbye yellow brick road” and curtis mayfield’s falsetto on “move on up”

elizabeth warren 

accepting that being vulnerable and embarrassed is better than keeping my pride but hating life

helping d repack her imac into its original box, which was hard for a while but we finally figured out

sarah hagi has a newsletter ([https://loneliness.substack.com/](https://loneliness.substack.com/))

ice cream with chunks of fudge in it

just three more weekends living in this place where we've been for a decade

closing the blinds at night to try to sleep later

youtube playlists of pirated audiobooks about english monarchs

green bananas
